Sentencas: An energy analysis of solid oxide fuel cell (SOFC) power systems with gas recycles fed by natural gas is carried out.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: Simple SOFC system, SOFC power systems with anode and cathode gas recycle respectively and SOFC power system with both anode and cathode gas recycle are compared.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: Influences of reforming rate, air ratio and recycle ratio of electrode exhaust gas on performance of SOFC power systems are investigated.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: Net system electric efficiency and cogeneration efficiency of these power systems are given by a calculation model.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: Results show that internal reforming SOFC power system can achieve an electrical efficiency of more than 44% and a system cogeneration efficiency including waste heat recovery of 68%.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: For SOFC power system with anode gas recycle, an electrical efficiency is above 46% and a cogeneration efficiency of 88% is obtained.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: In the case of cathode gas recycle, an electrical efficiency and a cogeneration efficiency is more than 51% and 78% respectively.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems

Sentencas: Although SOFC system with both anode and cathode gas is more complicated, the electrical efficiency of it is close to 52%.
Titulo: Effects of gas recycle on performance of solid oxide fuel cell power systems
